column2: SummaryOfYearTotal <- aggregate(data$COUNT, by = list(data$YEAR, data$COMPLAINT), sum)

ggplot() + geom_line(aes(x = SummaryOfYearTotal$YEAR , y = SummaryOfYearTotal$Total, colour = SummaryOfYearTotal$COMPLAINT)) + theme(legend.position = "bottom", legend.title = element_blank()) + labs(x = "Year", y = "Observations") + ggtitle("Total Complaints by Year and Complaint Type")
